bshields.istation.interfaces

Interface ShelfSlot

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultShelfSlot

    public interface ShelfSlot
    Represents a slot on a vending machine's shelf. The slot holds items in the vending machine, and all items in a slot cost the same.
    Author:
    Brian

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds an item to the front of the slot

    • Method Detail

      • addFirst

        void addFirst(VendingMachineItem item)
        Adds an item to the front of the slot
        Parameters:
        item - the item to add
        See Also:
        addLast(VendingMachineItem), removeFirst()

      • addLast

        void addLast(VendingMachineItem item)
        Adds an item to the back of the slot
        Parameters:
        item - the item to add
        See Also:
        addFirst(VendingMachineItem), removeLast()

      • removeFirst

        VendingMachineItem removeFirst()
        Removes an item from the front of the slot. This method should be called when purchasing items.
        Returns:
        the item that was removed from the slot
        See Also:
        removeLast(), addFirst(VendingMachineItem)

      • removeLast

        VendingMachineItem removeLast()
        Removes an item from the back of the slot.
        Returns:
        the item that was removed from the slot
        See Also:
        removeFirst(), addLast(VendingMachineItem)

      • peek

        VendingMachineItem peek()
        Gets a copy of the item at the front of the slot. This method is useful for presenting what items are visible to the customer. The returned object is a copy, so that a consuming class cannot modify the item without removing it.
        Returns:
        a copy of the item at the front of the slot

        int getPrice()

        void setPrice(int price)
